metadata.title: CVE-2021-3803 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
nth-check is vulnerable to Inefficient Regular Expression Complexity

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3803` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-nth-check - 2.0.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-nth-check package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.0.1-1').
